de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.path.components.interpreter
Class AnchorInterpreter

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.components.interpreter.ExpressionInterpreterImpl<Anchor>
      de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.path.components.interpreter.AnchorInterpreter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExpressionInterpreter<Anchor>
public class AnchorInterpreter
extends ExpressionInterpreterImpl<Anchor>

Special interpreter class to interpret anchors.

The grammar production rule of the expression is:

anchor ::= '.' | variable | topic-ref | literal

Author:
Sven Krosse

interpret

public QueryMatches interpret(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                              IContext context,
                              java.lang.Object... optionalArguments)
                       throws TMQLRuntimeException
Method called to interpret the current expression.

Parameters:
runtime - the runtime
context - the context
optionalArguments - any optional arguments
Returns:
the results of this expression as QueryMatches
Throws:
TMQLRuntimeException - thrown if querying fails

getSystemReference

private java.lang.Object getSystemReference(ITMQLRuntime runtime,
                                            IContext context,
                                            java.lang.String variable)
Internal method to handle system references.

Parameters:
runtime - the runtime
context - the querying context
variable - the variable name
Returns:
the value of the system reference or null if the variable is not a system variable
